meanings.definition: A chronic fungal infection of the skin and subcutaneous tissue caused by Sporothrix schenckii.
meanings.sent1: Sporotrichosis can lead to skin problems that last a long time.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with sporotrichosis after examining the skin infection.
meanings.sent3: The fungal party in the skin caused sporotrichosis to be the life of the party!
meanings.sent4: Her sporotrichosis was like a stubborn guest overstaying its welcome on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The sporotrichosis on his skin spread slowly like a creeping shadow.

meanings.definition: An infection caused by the fungus Sporothrix schenckii, typically affecting the skin.
meanings.sent1: The fungus Sporothrix schenckii is the troublemaker behind sporotrichosis.
meanings.sent2: Sporotrichosis often shows up as a skin infection due to the fungus.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fungus Sporothrix schenckii loves to cause sporotrichosis on unsuspecting skin.
meanings.sent4: Her sporotrichosis was a pesky visitor that refused to leave her skin.
meanings.sent5: The skin infection known as sporotrichosis can be as persistent as a clingy friend.
